title: Home on Kahlil Lechelt's Blog
description: Recent content in Home on Kahlil Lechelt's Blog

items.title: Hi, my name is Kahlil Lechelt
items.content_html:
I am a JavaScript developer located close to Karlsruhe, Germany. I am currently working at LogMeIn in Karlsruhe as an Engineering Manager for GoToMeeting.

I am @kahliltweets on Twitter which is a great way to reach me and if you prefer email you can always write to hello at kahlil dot info.

You can find all my open source code on GitHub.

I make music with my friends at SMASH HIFI and at NESTED LOOPS.

If you want you can Ask Me Anything.

items.title: Podcast
items.content_html:
Update from 2020-05-19:
The podcast below has been discontinued. We just got too busy and our schedules were not combinable anymore.

I am working on some other stuff. Stay tuned.

Every week I record an episode of the Reactive podcast with my friend Henning Glatter-GÃ¶tz. We talk about tech, culture, web development and things we learned or noticed over the last week.

You can subscribe to it on iTunes or your favorite podcast app. And if you like it we’d be thrilled if you’d leave a review.
